text:
When a block set text-indent value and text-align="start" (or omit), the layout
effect looks like assign a padding-end with the text-indent value. When
text-align is other, the layout effect is OK.
The fop 0.20.5 has no this problem.

See http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi?rev=329797&view=rev

For text-align="start" the available IPD was incorectly reduced by the value of 
text-indent. text-indent is modelled by adding a Knuth element at the beginning 
of a paragraph. It is not required to change the available IPD.
